content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Good to meet you, Mr. Li. Based on our discussions, I am willing to accept the rental price of €800 per month. This price reflects the location and condition of the apartment, as well as the market rate in the area. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student. I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.

I understand that the location of the apartment is important, and I am willing to accept the rental price of €800 per month. Thank you for your offer, but I am looking for something more affordable. Do you have any other options available?
name: Bo Li from China

content: I understand your concerns, Mr. Li. While the location and condition of the apartment are certainly factors to consider, I am willing to negotiate on the rental price to meet your needs. May I ask what your budget is for renting an apartment in Mannheim? This will help me to better understand your requirements and provide you with more affordable options.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for something under €700 per month.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am not willing to accept the rental price of €800 per month. I would like to explore other options that are more affordable. Do you have any other apartments available in Mannheim that could fit my needs and budget?
name: Bo Li from China

content: I understand your concerns, Mr. Li.
